sentence: Cancer Genomics is the branch of biology that studies the genomes of tumours
Cancer Genomics is the study of forensics by the police at a crime scene
A mutation is an error or a change in the DNA sequence of a cell
A mutation is something found on a crime scene
Cells are the basic building blocks of our bodies
Cells arethe information to build the human body
Human cells keep their DNA within the nucleus
Human cells keep their DNA within the cytoplasm
DNA carries the genetic instructions for the development, functioning, growth and reproduction of all known organisms
DNA is the name of a book of instructions to cook a perfect cake
UV light can cause mutations
Mutations are not accumulated during aging
Smoking can cause mutations
Mutations are only caused by external agents like tobacco
All cancer mutations are driver mutations
Cancer driver mutations confer growing and proliferative capabilities e to the cells bearing them
Driver mutations receive their name because they were discovered by a taxi driver
The tumours from different cancer patients can have different driver mutations
Cancer is a single disease
Cancer is a group of diseases characterized by the uncontrolled growth and proliferation of cells within the body
Cancer is caused by a tropical mosquito bite
Cancer is caused by mutations in the DNA
Targeted therapies are the type of treatments that attack specific cancer cells with less harm to normal cells
Targeted therapies are the same as chemotherapy
Cancer Genome Interpreter retrieves information about targeted therapies
IntOGen retrieves information about targeted therapies
